scripts.pack: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install @jxkang/utils@latest && npm install @jxkang/web-cmpt@latest && rm -rf ./package-lock.json
scripts.builder: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && RUN_ENV={env:1} react-builder build && tar cvf build.tar build
scripts.builder:pre: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && RUN_ENV={env:2} react-builder build && tar cvf build.tar build
scripts.builder:daily: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && RUN_ENV={env:3} react-builder build && tar cvf build.tar build
scripts.builder:dev: rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && react-builder build && tar cvf build.tar build
